availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Andrew Irvine (Richmond, KY, farmer and letter signer)

body.p: Madison County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Farmer in Madison County in 1863. Signed letter to Governor Beriah Magoffin on March 11, 1861 stating intention to serve in a militia company from Richmond, Kentucky.

ab.bibl:
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records (Provost Marshal General's Bureau; Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865), NARA RG 110, 8th Congressional District, Madison County, Kentucky, July 1863, p. 186 (p. 189 of microfilm), (Accessed via ancestry.com on October 10, 2019).
KYR-0002-022-0114.
